name: Singapore Egg Noodles
recipeIngredient: 115 g pork fillet (cut into thin strips),
115 g fresh fish fillet (cut into bitesize pieces),
2 small squid (cleaned and sliced reserving tenticles),
Small bunch of fresh coriander (roughly chopped).
recipeInstructions: 1. In a wok fry off the garlic.
2. When it becomes fragrant stir in the pork, fish, prawns,  and squid, tossing them around in the pan for 1 minute.
3. Pour in the stock and simmer to reduce it.
4. Add the noodles and toss them around in the wok for 1 minute.
5. Stir in the carrot and cabbage.
6. Add the soy sauces and cook until most of the liquid has been evaporated.
